data.title: TEMPLEMAN The Telegraph Announcements

data.text:
Barbara Mollie (Bobs) passed away peacefully at home, aged 95, with her devoted son Simon in attendance. Much loved wife of the late Michael. Grandmother to her adored grandsons, Giles and Luke and proud mother-in-law to Teresa. No flowers please. Donations if desired, to Macmillan Cancer. Private cremation. A celebration of Barbara's life will be held later. Placed By Simon Templeman

Val, of Sevenoaks. Died peacefully in her sleep on 17th June 2020, aged 93. Dearly loved by all her family and friends. A full celebration of her life to be held at a later date. Show more Â»
